page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: Village Leisure 1. Women's Institute.A cultural and practical activity group. 2. Friendly Circle.For the over 60's providing a general meeting place, outside visits and promoting cultural and self-help activities. 3. Royal British Legion.For ex-service people and associates. 4. Royal Ancient Order of Buffaloes.A men-only secret society. 5. A toddlers group provides a meeting place for young parents and children. 6. A Brownie Pack. 7. The two inns support cribbage and darts teams.One has a swimming-pool. 8. There is a village play-field,but no club facilities for teenagers. N.B.Cubs and Pre-school playgroup are in Bratton 1 mile away.Many villagers find entertainment in larger towns or works social clubs,but TV reigns.
